info.test: If the LCD is on but not showing prints, try turning the trimmer on the I2C backpack.

app.desc:
A small LCD screen, allowing the display of short message or simple drawings via I2C interface.

Sample Application: Clock using Arduino I2C bus for both RTC and 16x2 LCD display

// initialize the lcd
    {{varname}}.begin(LCD_COLUMNS, LCD_ROWS, LCD_ADDRESS, BACKLIGHT);
